abstract: Pete Wells reviews Asian restaurant Cassia in Santa Monica, Calif.

headline.print_headline: Asian Flavors in a California Light
headline.main: Our Restaurant Critic Goes National. First Stop: California.

snippet: Cassia in Santa Monica, Calif., serves up large flavors with delicacy and a pointed lack of interest in being confrontational....
lead_paragraph: Cassia in Santa Monica, Calif., serves up large flavors with delicacy and a pointed lack of interest in being confrontational.
